trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> when the user accesses a `DBNull` value.
The <xref:System.Data.StrongTypingException> class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.StrongTypingException"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Data.StrongTypingException> class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.StrongTypingException"></xref> class with the specified string.
The <xref:System.Data.StrongTypingException> class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
The string to display when the exception is thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.StrongTypingException"></xref> class using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
The <xref:System.Data.StrongTypingException> class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.StrongTypingException"></xref> class with the specified string and inner exception.
The <xref:System.Data.StrongTypingException> class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
The string to display when the exception is thrown.
A reference to an inner exception.
